title: Training Needs Analysis for Instructional Design and Strategy (IDS): Enhancing Mathematics Practitioner Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of fundamental mathematics education knowledge and practical teaching experience
context.additional_context: A customized training program for current mathematics educators to strengthen IDS (Instructional Design and Systems) theory and practical competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can construct a mathematics education design framework by applying IDS (Instructional Design System) basic principles
Learners enhance their ability to derive IDS requirements for educational settings by analyzing survey results
Learners complete a project developing subject-specific teaching strategies for mathematics in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
